author: By PAT EATON-ROBB Associated Press
title: Businesses adapt to new order, people urged to stay home
description: HARTFORD, Conn. (AP) — Connecticut businesses adapted to new social distancing guidelines Tuesday, and state lawmakers were planning to continue work on an assistance package for small companies affected by the coronavirus outbreak despite the postponement of…
